mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT FROM UEPP_Qyjbxx j WHERE (j.xgr is null or j.xgr != 'crawler') AND (j.tyshxydm IS NULL OR LEN(j.tyshxydm) != 18)

SELECT DISTINCT qy.qyID,qy.qymc, qy.zzjgdm,qy.yyzzzch,qy.tyshxydm,qy.xgr,qy.tag,qy.DataState FROM UEPP_Qyjbxx qy INNER JOIN UEPP_Qycsyw yw ON qy.qyID = yw.qyID WHERE yw.csywlxID IN (5,2,6) AND len(tyshxydm) = 18 AND qy.qyID not in (SELECT c.corp_id FROM Corp_Cert)

SELECT DISTINCT qy.qyID,qy.qymc, qy.zzjgdm,qy.yyzzzch,qy.tyshxydm,qy.xgr,qy.tag,qy.DataState FROM UEPP_Qyjbxx qy WHERE qy.qyID in (SELECT c.corp_id FROM Corp_Cert c where cert_type in ('设计资质','勘察资质') and c.trade_type is null group by corp_id)

SELECT DISTINCT qy.qyID,qy.qymc, qy.zzjgdm,qy.yyzzzch,qy.tyshxydm,qy.xgr,qy.tag,qy.DataState FROM UEPP_Qyjbxx qy INNER JOIN Corp_Cert c ON qy.qyID = c.corp_id WHERE c.cert_type_id in (1,2) AND ( CityID != '320200' OR CityID is null) AND qy.qyID not in (SELECT corp_id FROM CorpRegStaff)
mapper.update: UPDATE UEPP_Qyjbxx SET tyshxydm = #{tyshxydm},xgr=#{xgr} WHERE qyID = #{qyID}
UPDATE UEPP_Qyjbxx SET xgr=#{xgr} WHERE qyID = #{qyID}
